code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import api from"../../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RaporDevam=()=>{const[veriler,setVeriler]=useState([]);const[tarih,setTarih]=useState(()=>new Date().toISOString().substring(0,10));useEffect(()=>{const veriyiGetir=async()=>{try{const res=await api.get("/devam-tarihli/".concat(tarih));setVeriler(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Veri alÄ±namadÄ±:",err);}};veriyiGetir();},[tarih]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"\uD83D\uDCC5 Personel Devam Raporu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"font-semibold mr-2",children:"Tarih Se\xE7:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:tarih,onChange:e=>setTarih(e.target.value),className:"border rounded px-3 py-1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"w-full border mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 border",children:"#"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 border",children:"Ad Soyad"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 border",children:"Durum"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tbody",{children:[veriler.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"text-center border-t hover:bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2 border",children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2 border",children:item.ad_soyad}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2 border",children:item.durum})]},item.id)),veriler.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:3,className:"text-center p-4 text-gray-500",children:"Kay\u0131t bulunamad\u0131."})})]})]})]});};export default RaporDevam;
